Package net.proteusframework.core.hibernate

Hibernate utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HibernateSessionAcceptor
    Interface for objects that accept a hibernate Session that is managed outside of the scope of the application.
    SessionLifeCycleListener
    Listener for HibernateSessionHandler life cycle.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelegatingHibernateInterceptor
    A hibernate interceptor base class that allows a user to delegate to a delegate interceptor.
    HibernateSessionHandler
    Manages implementations of HibernateSessionAcceptor by setting Session instances appropriately.
    HibernateSessionHelper
    Helper class for implementing the HibernateSessionAcceptor.
    HibernateSessionHelperBeanInfo
    Bean Info
    SessionLifeCycleEvent
    Event for SessionLifeCycleListener.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OnRule
    On Rule.
    OnRuleAction
    Additional actions not supported by hibernate.
    SessionLifeCycleEvent.EventType
    Event type.
    SessionLifeCycleEvent.SessionType
    Session type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TransactionPreviouslyRolledBackException
    An exception to indicate that commit has been called on a transaction that has already been rolled back.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    HibernateSessionAcceptorConfig
    Attributes for a HibernateSessionAcceptor.
    OnDelete
    Annotation to fill in the gaps of hibernate's foreign key support (version 3.x).

Package net.proteusframework.core.hibernate Description

Hibernate utilities.
